short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically Shorten URLs Quickly with Shortcut.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Quick URL allows you to quickly shorten URLs using the shortcut (Ctrl/Command + Shift + U)!


1. Simply open the tab with the URL you want to shorten and press the shortcut (Ctrl/Command + Shift + U). 
2. When you paste it, it will automatically be converted to a short URL.
 

If the shortcut doesn't work, please check it in chrome://extensions/shortcuts.
